description: From there +â€Ž by. Compare the parallel formation of German dabei.

entries.meaning: (formal) By it; by that; by that means, or as a consequence of that.
examples: This Constitution, and the Laws of the United States which shall be made in Pursuance thereof; and all Treaties made, or which shall be made, under the Authority of the United States, shall be the supreme Law of the Land; and the Judges in every State shall be bound thereby, any Thing in the Constitution or Laws of any State to the Contrary notwithstanding.
